1024240.name: Ectolibrium Soundtrack
1024240.description:
25 unique tracks by the awesome Blunt Weapon Damage. This soundtrack includes the full-length tracks from Ectolibrium Episode One, plus a number of shorter interstitial pieces which preview future content in the Ectoverse. This soundtrack will be expanded over time. For now, it's just an additional way of supporting Ectolibrium's development, for those so inclined!
